properties.Name: FinanceTerm
properties.Description:
A finance term or condition that may be applied to a transaction.

Ex:
-  COD
-  60 Days Net
-  30 Days Net
-  Cash and Carry
- 4% Annual Percentage Rate Financing
 - No Down Payment to qualified customers
 - No interest on financed balance 
-  No interest on financed balance for 3 months
-  Monthly payments required
-  10% down payment at date of sale
-  Balance payable without penalty or additional interest payment

Columns.Name: FinanceTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Finance Term.

Columns.Name: FinanceTermName
Columns.Description: The name of the Finance Term.

Columns.Name: FinanceTermDescription
Columns.Description: The description of the Finance Term.
